channel.title: Downloading Warning
channel.description:
I've seen some people downloading viruses from links that are required in these sections, I'm warning you to check the link first, scan it with your Virus scanner. I've been caught with many Viruses and havn't been able to take them off, please listen to this carefully, and realising that you have currently got a Trojan Virus or anything simular.
-------------->>><<< Virus Scanner Download Instructions >>><<<---------------
1) Click HERE to go to Google 2) Type 'Virus Scanner Download Free' 3) Press the 2nd link 4) Click download
-------------->>><<< Virus Scanner Download End Instuctions >>><<<----------------
---------<color"red"> <size"23"> YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED </>

item.title: Downloading Warning
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

It’s nice that you care, but it doesn’t take much to understand a bit of batch code or that application files in a server folder are probably viruses.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading Warning

item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

what everyone else says…

if people are stupid enough to download a virus… then good for them… we dont need warnings… we need people reading stickies
